name: Static Website Starter
description: A basic static website template with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript structure

files.README.md:
# {{PROJECT_NAME}}

A static website created from the Bootstrapper template.

## Getting Started

1. Open `index.html` in your browser
2. Start editing the files to customize your website
3. Add your content to the HTML file
4. Style your website in `css/styles.css`
5. Add interactivity with `js/scripts.js`

## File Structure

```
{{PROJECT_NAME}}/
â”œâ”€â”€ index.html          # Main HTML file
â”œâ”€â”€ css/
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ styles.css     # Stylesheets
â”œâ”€â”€ js/
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ scripts.js     # JavaScript files
â”œâ”€â”€ img/               # Images folder
â””â”€â”€ README.md          # This file
```

## Development

This is a simple static website. You can:

- Open `index.html` directly in your browser
- Use a local development server like Live Server in VS Code
- Deploy to any static hosting service

## Customization

- Edit `index.html` to change the structure
- Modify `css/styles.css` to update the styling
- Add functionality in `js/scripts.js`
- Place images in the `img/` folder

Happy coding! ðŸš€
